name: places/ChIJlWyYZYhZwokR-rSRFxE4jYU
formattedAddress: 200 E 36th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 200 E 36th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Small is the best. Even with extracting a molar! I felt nothing. Absolutely nothing and the office is so nice and friendly. Such a great experience.

text.text: Dr. Small is the best. Even with extracting a molar! I felt nothing. Absolutely nothing and the office is so nice and friendly. Such a great experience.

originalText.text:
This dental office is ran pretty well. I also got what I expected my dental insurance to cover for my teeth cleaning. No random fees or anything.

The dentist pointed out possible cavities and  just told me to floss better versus pushing for any other treatment.

The Netflix and Hulu is a nice touch so that I am not staring at a ceiling.

The office works with different ages. So I sometimes felt like the interactions reminded me of them talking to someone younger. It’s not an actual complaint to stop them from getting 5 stars from me.

text.text:

originalText.text: It’s a very modern boutique style dental office. Dr Small is so so great!!! He makes you feel comfortable and welcomed. The practice has TV on ceilings!!! I was literally watching Jane the virgin on Netflix. Overall, I’m very pleased with my experience. No hidden fees. Front desk explain everything before anything is done. ;)

text.text: It’s a very modern boutique style dental office. Dr Small is so so great!!! He makes you feel comfortable and welcomed. The practice has TV on ceilings!!! I was literally watching Jane the virgin on Netflix. Overall, I’m very pleased with my experience. No hidden fees. Front desk explain everything before anything is done. ;)

originalText.text: Dr. Small is a great dentist because he really cares for his patients. He has a welcoming personality and addresses all of your concerns. The practice is beautiful and the staff is fantastic!!

text.text: Dr. Small is a great dentist because he really cares for his patients. He has a welcoming personality and addresses all of your concerns. The practice is beautiful and the staff is fantastic!!

originalText.text: Came in here for cleaning and Invisalign consultation. Very clean and friendly facility. Dr Small answered all my questions!
